name: Lonely Skies (itch) (starandsnow)
description:
Analyze radio signals from across the stars to look for signs of intelligent life. Is there anyone out there, or are we alone in the universe?

Note: the LonelySkies_fixes.love contains a fix for a crash that was discovered after the jam was completed. I recommend that you play this version, but the original is saved here for anyone who wants to be strict about the deadline.

Made over 72 hours for LÖVE Jam 2020

Runs on LÖVE 11.3. May run on earlier versions, but has not been tested.
